about_the_game:
Welcome to Acidpunk: Echoes of Doll City soundtrack!

A massive selection of over 30 carefully crafted tracks, ranging from synthwave to more ambient and guitar driven tunes. What would people in Doll City listen to? Discover and enjoy the music of 33 fictional bands and connect to the heartbeat of this corrupted megalopolis.

All tracks are made by Aerosteak, AKA Serge Sentis, main sound designer and composer for the game. Artwork by gaeldk.
